# Dom Add
<!--
@name: Dom Add
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Add an HTML element create with "Dom Create" command into an other HTML Element
## Parameters

- **childId&dollar;**: ID of the element to add.
- **parentId&dollar;**: ID of the HTML element container.
---
